message: Can I order a pepperoni pizza

Great! I found Pepperoni on our menu for AED 43.0. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. If you would like to proceed, could you please provide me with your NYU ID (8 digits), valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C) and a phone number (9-15 digits)?

Please note: The information provided is for internal use only and should not be repeated in the conversation with the user.

[ORDER STATUS] - User has requested to order Pepperoni, awaiting NYU ID, building number, and phone number.
